about_the_game:
Feel free to play with this Demo release. Please leave comments for helping me to improve this game.

This is a Domino simulation game. You can create as many domino tiles as you want in this game before your computer gets burned. Also, "Cube" can be used to build anything you like, such as a bridge, a gate, or some other buildings.

This Demo version is only for people to have a try with DomiCard, and see if you like it or not. The Demo version only support Single-player model.
If you like it, please find the non-free version "DomiCard", it supports multiplayer model (LAN and WAN), and Steam Workshop in the game to help you to build a more fantastic domino world.
detailed_description:
Feel free to play with this Demo release. Please leave comments for helping me to improve this game.

This is a Domino simulation game. You can create as many domino tiles as you want in this game before your computer gets burned. Also, "Cube" can be used to build anything you like, such as a bridge, a gate, or some other buildings.

This Demo version is only for people to have a try with DomiCard, and see if you like it or not. The Demo version only support Single-player model.
If you like it, please find the non-free version "DomiCard", it supports multiplayer model (LAN and WAN), and Steam Workshop in the game to help you to build a more fantastic domino world.

name: DomiCard Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 7200 GS
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
